body: English version at /g/182059. The plot is really haunting and fucked up.. I identify with the boy because I inherited my father's estate after he was killed by some asshole with a handgun. No cold dispassionate maid to fuck my ass though.  I guess I could hire one lol.. somehow I just can't get into hookers.. even if they are pro-dommes.  Still basically sex for money.. it cheapens whole thing.  I want to be abused by a woman who is abusive for the fun of it, not for money. :P
There is no god in the world except allah, mohammad is the messenger of allah. allah akbar, ALLAH AKBAR.
oh please can't wait for the english translation
